channel.title: Ignaroz on tlake.io
channel.description: Recent content in Ignaroz on tlake.io

item.description: Summary The party’s escape from the tower stalls with the realization that they are unable to teleport all of their summoned creatures to safety. Knowing Fierna could locate them any moment, some hard decisions are made at the expense of Zed’s minotaur friends, and the Menagerie finally teleports away.

item.title: Ignaroz
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Ignaroz Assistant to Carmen (?) who facilitates creation and administration of Tymphal’s Contract with the The Menagerie. Description Appearance First Meeting the Party a female spined devil, with white spines.
